```{r}
#| echo: false
schedule <- tribble(
  ~`number`, ~tip, ~`description`, ~`misc`,
  'Tip 1', 'cmd + opt + i', 
  'creates a new R chunk',
  'cntrl + alt + i for PC',
  
  'Tip 2', 'Tools -> Global Options... -> Appearance',
  'allows for dark mode, plus other options!', ' '
)
```

